nodes.text: The Thokosia system was located in the Maerdocian sector, a part of the Slice portion of the Mid Rim. It was situated on the hyperlane known as the Gamor Run, which connected it to the Shador system as well as the Daalang system of the Daalang sector.

At some point, the royal governor of the Thokosia system hired the smuggler Uxbeg to transport a shipment of spice to the Hutt crime lord Spadda in the Aikhibba system of the Fei Hu sector. Before Uxbeg could up the cargo, however, it was intercepted by the smuggler's rival, Lo Khan, who delivered it to Aikhibba instead.

The Thokosia system was first mentioned in the 1993 Dark Empire Sourcebook, which was authored by Michael Allen Horne and published by West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed it in grid square Q-13.
